title: Preity Zinta Shares Video Of Cow 'Obeying Traffic Rules,' Proves Animals Are Better Than Humans
text:
Preity Zinta Shares Video Of Cow 'Obeying Traffic Rules,' Proves Animals Are Better Than Humans

Preity Zinta Shares Video Of Cow 'Obeying Traffic Rules,' Proves Animals Are Better Than Humans

If it is too difficult for you to abide by traffic rules while travelling then just learn something from this cow! And that is what Preity Zinta is trying to tell people through this video that she shared on Twitter.

The video clip features a cow standing at a traffic signal along with other vehicles and patiently waiting for the lights to turn green. The video was captioned as ‘Forget people even our animals obey traffic rules. Don't believe me - watch this.’ It is so true!

Watch the video here:

एसे देख के सीखों ट्रैफ़िक रूल्ज़ कैसे फ़ॉलो करते है 😂 Forget people even our animals obey traffic rules. Don’t believe me - watch this 🤩 #sundayfunday #ting pic.twitter.com/LYCciDpnrp — Preity G Zinta (@realpreityzinta) October 6, 2019

The video has till now garnered 56.6k views, 6.3k likes and many comments praising the cow, no kidding!

1.

👍💐....they may be scared of being TRAFFIC KED 🤣 — Ramchandran Venkatraman 🌝 (@JumbuTweeple) October 6, 2019

2.

Kya Kehna?. — I A K (@its_IAK) October 6, 2019

Don't Miss 1 K SHARES 1.4 K SHARES 998 SHARES 313 SHARES

3.

4.

5.

Animals better than humanity — Cricketopia (@BlueArmy33333) October 6, 2019

6.

I think the cow know the traffic rules better than some ppl there 😂😝 — 𝓐𝓷𝓷𝓮 🍁🍂 (@Aggi_89) October 6, 2019

7.

Hahahahaha! Babe you’re so funny!🤣😘😍 — Mary Elizabeth (@MaryArizona1984) October 6, 2019

The video definitely reminds us that animals are better than humans when it comes to obeying rules.

Preity Zinta was last seen in Bhaiaji Superhit and after a lot of speculation she finally got married to her longtime beau, Gene Goodenough on February 28, 2016.
description: If it is too difficult for you to abide by the traffic rules while travelling, then just learn something from this cow! And that is what Preity Zinta is intending to tell people through this hilarious video that she shared on Twitter. The video clip features a cow at a traffic signal along with other vehicles as the animal waited patiently for the lights to go green.
